name: Last Night Before
description:
This is a short story about a person living in a moment of anxiety before an important moment.

The art you see in here is actually a placeholder art, but I think you can get the idea of the story with it, which is the most important part.

There are a few glitches as we are still learning how to predict deadlines. We started really late in this jam, but I really hope you will get the message.

This one was made for the haunted rainbow jam 2016.

By

Michelle Faifer @micfaifer
Emmanuel Santana @flyingvelvetlob
